SearchRequestDTO.description: Each property is optional e.g. {"from": 0, "amount": 75}, {"amount": 75} or {} are all valid

orderBy.description: attribute to order by e.g. id, name, ..

from.description: this will skip the first x results, is usefull for pagination

amount.description: will return a total of x results

filter.description: (OPTIONAL) Filter object for more complex filter operations

description.example: This is a short description of ...

controllerId.description: id of parent controller, because each responsibility is linked to one controller

category.description: category of UCAs currently as Enums "0" is Provided, "1" is Not Provided, "2" is too early or too late and "3" is 'stopped too soon or applied too long'

LockRequestDTO.description: the parentId property is only necessary if entity has parents e.g. subHazard, subSystemConstraint, uca, controllerConstraint, responsibility

parentId.description: id of parent of entity to lock (only if entity has parent)

entityName.description: predefined entity name which are defined in xstampp-common/src/.../common/utils/EntityNameConstant.java

expirationTime.description: timestamp can be calculated with:  let expTime = new Date(date.getTime() + (expiresInMin * 60 * 1000)).toISOString(); expTime = expTime.substring(0, expTime.length - 1).replace('T', ' ');

UnlockRequestDTO.description: the parentId property is only necessary if entity has parents e.g. subHazard, subSystemConstraint, uca, controllerConstraint, responsibility

parentId.description: id of parent of entity to lock (only if entity has parent)

entityName.description: predefined entity name which are defined in xstampp-common/src/.../common/utils/EntityNameConstant.java

boxes.description: string which represents a json which represents an array of boxes

arrows.description: string which represents a json which represents an array of arrows

BoxRelatedEntityRequestDTO.description: Summary of all control structure entities which are linked to boxes e.g. the 6 types of ActuatorRequestDTO, SensorRequestDTO, ControllerRequestDTO, ControlledProcessRequestDTO,ControlAlgorithmRequestDTO, ProcessVariableRequestDTO

ArrowRelatedEntityRequestDTO.description: Summary of all control structure entities which are linked to boxes e.g. the 3 types of ControlActionRequestDTO, InputRequestDTO, OutputRequestDTO

processVariableId.description: id of a linked Process variable
